@lenard102593
1. Download NoCD mod here
http://nraas.wikispaces.com/NoCD+Phase+One
2. Download the framework file in second point in the website below 
http://simswiki.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:Installing_Sims_3_Package_Files/Setup_and_Files
3. Extract the framework file in Documents/Electronic Arts/The Sim 3
4. Extract the NoCD mod and a file should appear
5. Place the file in Documents/Electronic Arts/The Sims 3/Mods/Packages

And your all done. Nothing else to click or do. 
Start your game by clicking
*Where you downloaded your game to*...Electronic Arts/The Sims 3 *(BASE GAME)*/Game/Bin/TS3.exe
The CD authentication should not pop up anymore.
Do not start via the launcher. I tried that it did not work.

Stuff to note:
Should there be a new patch, constantly check that your mod is usable for the new patch level over here
http://nraas.wikispaces.com/NoCD

Nraas also has lots of other mods which you can download using the same method. Check their website!
http://nraas.wikispaces.com/

All expansions are 2.4 GB and all stuff packs are ~300 MB.  The rest of space is the useless updates in the Support folder. I say useless because 1.5GB are for Mac which most don't need, and 1 GB is for the normal cumulative update which becomes useless when a new update arrives, and you only need the latest one.

But for everyone asking for a crack, Nraas' NoCD mod doesn't work for this version of supernatural so, if you have Showtime installed and still have the installer for it, uninstall that expansion then install this one. Then REINSTALL Showtime and apply the crack for that expansion. It should work that way.

@ritagold you need to copy the folders from the iso  to programfiles/electronicarts/simssupernatural

You can get this to work now, you just have to jump through a few hoops to get there.
Once you've installed the game, copy the "Caches", "Game", "GameData" and "Thumbnails" folders to the "The Sims 3 Supernatural" folder.
Then go to "The Sims 3 Supernatural" > "Game" > "Bin" and change "Sims3Launcher.ex_" to "Sims3Launcher.exe" and "TS3EP07.ex_" to "TS3EP07.exe"
After this you can use the nocd mod and play the game

I was having the same problems as ritagold and enterland but followed zaronon instructions exactly and now its working. Thanks a million for that!  Oh btw in order to edit the default and skuversion files i had to move my bin file to my desktop first as i did not have permission to edit while it was in program files. Once done just move it back into The Sims 3 Supernatural" > "Game" >

INSTRUCTIONS:

Once you’ve installed the game, copy the “Caches”, “Game”, “GameData” and “Thumbnails” folders to the “The Sims 3 Supernatural” folder.

Then go to “The Sims 3 Supernatural” > “Game” > “Bin” and change “Sims3Launcher.ex_” to “Sims3Launcher.exe” and “TS3EP07.ex_” to “TS3EP07.exe”

you have to go into “Default.ini” and “skuversion.txt” and change the line “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018017″ to “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018001″.

After this you can use the nocd mod and play the game

PS: Do the above hack or just wait for crack.

I made an account just to help you guys out.
This works 100% even without the crack but only with some tweaking. It's not even hard. Do this: 

1st Install the game then follow this instructions:

You can get this to work now,
you just have to jump through a few hoops to get there.
Once you’ve installed the game, copy the “Caches”, “Game”, “GameData” and “Thumbnails” folders to the “The Sims 3 Supernatural” folder.
Then go to “The Sims 3 Supernatural” > “Game” > “Bin” and change “Sims3Launcher.ex_” to “Sims3Launcher.exe” and “TS3EP07.ex_” to “TS3EP07.exe”
you have to go into “Default.ini” and “skuversion.txt” and change the line “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018017″ to “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018001″.
After this you can use the nocd mod and play the game (Remember to install frameworks)
Have fun !
More info on how to install the nocd and frameworks:
1. Download NoCD mod here
http://nraas.wikispaces.com/NoCD+Phase+One
2. Download the framework file in second point in the website below
http://simswiki.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:Installing_Sims_3_Package_Files/Setup_and_Files

I did this and it worked! Couldn't even believe it. But so happy I'm going to play all day and night now. Hope you guys use this info! Remember to install the Framework so that you can use the Nocd mod. Follow the instructions on the links carefully. Then do the small changes to the files and copy the folders mentioned over to supernatural folder. 
this step: "you have to go into “Default.ini” and “skuversion.txt” and change the line “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018017″ to “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018001″" might give small trouble, drag them to your desktop which allows them to be modified, then put them back. 
Tada!

I figured out how to get the game to work perfectly.

1. Patch your Sims 3 to the latest version.
2. Download and run the installer for this game and use this key MXBT-29VY-V57Z-A3WU-XAXK.
3. Copy every folder from the ISO file into your Sims 3 Supernatural installation overwriting everything.
4. Open Default.ini in the "Bin" folder and change “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018017″ to “GameVersion = 15.0.135.018018"
5. Go here http://nraas.wikispaces.com/NoCD and download the BaseMod.
6. Extract the .package file into your Mods/Packages folder.
7. Enjoy the game!

THOSE HAVING TROUBLE WITH SIMPLY THE CRACK:

It's a LOT easier to just use the NRaas package file ( http://nraas.wikispaces.com/NoCD ) than to crack the game every time you install the next EP/SP. Drop it in your DocumentsElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3ModsPackages folder, and you won't need to crack the game again. Those who don't have the mods folder set up can view the tutorial here > http://www.modthesims.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:Installing_Sims_3_Package_Files/Setup_and_Files

If you have trouble updating, use the cumulative super patcher ( http://forum.thesims3.com/jforum/posts/list/175477.page ) Bookmark the page, it's updated every time there's a game patch.
Just so people are clear, the Mac installer is not here. I am trying some other ones to see if I can find it.

IF YOU’RE HAVING THE STARTUP ERROR “Service initialization failed (0x0175dcbb)”

HOW TO FIX:

1. Push Start
2. In Search Box type regedit and push ENTER
3. Open HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE Folder
4. Open SOFTWARE Folder
5. Find “Sims” Folder
6. Right Click and push Delete
7. REINSTALL SIMS COMPLETELY

IF “Sims” is not there, check under a Folder that starts with “Wow” it should be under there.
@BillA1016 and other mac users. The link I sent is a torrent that has the mac version too.
By the way, those having problems with the NRaas NoCD should note that it does NOT work if you launch the game via the launcher. Directly launch it via TS3W.exe.
